CustomField.formula: IF( Number_of_Exams_Required__c > 0, CASE( License_Registration_Type__c , "Car Wash", "A Car Wash exam is required. The exam fee is $100 for first-time business registrations and $50 for registration renewals. A representative from your company will need to complete the exam and pay the exam fee in order to obtain a license.", "Farm Labor", "A Farm Labor exam is required. The exam fee is $50. A representative from your company will need to complete the exam and pay the exam fee in order to obtain a license.", "No exams necessary at this time."), "No exams necessary at this time.")
CustomField.label: Exam Requirements
